units.title: Generate FLP/FRT hiPSC reporter line
units.text: To verify the lineage potential of mesothelial epicardial cells in our system, we generated epicardioids from the FLP/FRT-based hiPSC reporter line and transduced them with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP (FLPERT2) under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 (Fig. 5a and Extended Data Fig. 9a).
units.rationale: Creates a traceable reporter line for lineage analysis.

units.title: Transduce epicardioids with FLP under MAB21L2 promoter
units.text: For JCF lineage tracing, epicardioids from this reporter line were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP (FLPERT2) under the control of the MAB21L2 promoter at day 3, and Data Fig. 9a.
units.rationale: Induces FLP expression specifically in JCF progenitors.

units.title: Apply 4‑hydroxytamoxifen (4‑OHT) at JCF stage
units.text: 4-hydroxytamoxifen (4-OHT) was applied at the beginning of the JCF stage (days 7–8; Fig. 4e and Extended Data Fig. 8a).
units.rationale: Activates inducible FLP recombination in target cells.

units.title: Confirm labeling after 72 h
units.text: After 72 h, we detected HA-tag+CDH1+ cells, indicating correct labeling of the mesothelial layer (Extended Data Fig. 9b).

units.title: Immunofluorescence analysis on day 12
units.text: On day 12, immunofluorescence analysis revealed HA-tag+ CMs and epicardial cells (both mesothelial and EPDCs), confirming the dual fate potential of epicardial fate decisions.
units.rationale: Assesses the differentiated cell types derived from labeled progenitors.

units.title: Subcluster metacell dataset
units.text: For this, we performed subclustering of metacell dataset to investigate the timing of fate decisions.
units.rationale: Identifies finer cell populations for trajectory analysis.

units.title: Infer macrostates with CellRank
units.text: CellRank47 to infer the terminal macrostates (myocytic, epicardial, endothelial and endodermal) and the probability of each cell to transition toward these states based on both pseudotime and RNA velocity.

units.title: Integrate transcriptome and chromatin data into metacells
units.text: we integrated the two modalities by constructing metacells containing both transcriptome and chromatin accessibility information, defining a total of 24 clusters from 35,499 metacells.
units.rationale: Creates multimodal cell clusters for comprehensive analysis.

units.title: Immunodetect NRP2 blocking antibody
units.text: immunodetection of the NRP2 blocking antibody after treatment indicated its predominant localization in the epicardial layer.
units.rationale: Validates the spatial effect of NRP2 inhibition.

units.title: Transduce hiPSCs with CDH1‑controlled FLP
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Sets up temporal control of FLP expression for downstream assays.
